bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I work as a software engineer, developed a good number softwares and worked on some research works. But I'm also really into robotics and electronics. I enjoy solving programming problems and working with IoT devices. It's exciting for me to blend software programs with physical hardware to create awesome things! Oh, I almost forgot to mention that I also work on developing desktop interfaces and web applications.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am very much interested to work with robotics or IoT devices. Also I am very passionate about Artificial Intelligence, I want to give robots the power of artificial intelligence. Sounds evil, right? ;) . Oh, let's talk about my personal interests, I love playing football, video games, travelling and also I am a foodie :D .

education.title: education
education.description: I have completed my B.Sc (Engineering) in Computer Science & Engineering. Currently looking forward to either doing my PhD or colaborating with any research lab of my interest.

1.title: ReachMe-Social Media
1.description: This social media website is built using PHP, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, featuring chat, posts, likes, comments, sharing, and media uploads. It includes friendlists, notifications, admin and moderator panels, utilizing technologies like jQuery, AJAX, MySQL, Bootstrap, Font Awesome, Google Fonts, and CKEditor.

2.title: Foodie-Restaurant Finder
2.description: This is a restaurant & food review and reccomendation website built using PHP, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, featuring restaurant search, reviews, ratings, and recommendations. It includes user profiles, friendlists, notifications, admin and moderator panels, utilizing technologies like jQuery, AJAX, MySQL, Bootstrap, Font Awesome, Google Fonts, and CKEditor.

3.title: Python Robot Controller
3.description: This is a python GUI to control a robot, this project is currently under a PhD research, so can't reveal much of it.

4.title: Python Robot Controller 2
4.description: This is another python GUI to control a bio-robotic sensory system, this project is currently under a PhD research, so can't reveal much of it.

5.title: Robotic Arm with Auto & Manual Control
5.description: I made an robotic arm controllable semi automatically or full manually by the control panel. I was initially planned to use glove control but lack of fund and materials/components forced me to implement the arm with the control panel instead of using a hand glove control.

6.title: NEUB CodeLand Forum Website
6.description: This was my first dynamic website project using php.

7.title: Automated Water Pump Controller
7.description: This is one of my IoT projects, I made this to control the water pump automatically based on the water level in the tank.

8.title: Game - Cave Advemture
8.description: This is a simple 2D game I made using Java Swing and AWT.

9.title: Internet Controlled Robotics Car
9.description: This is a robotic car that can be controlled via wifi locally and also can be controlled via internet from anywhere in the world.

10.title: Simple Calculator App
10.description: This is a simple calculator app I made using Java Swing and AWT.

11.title: Bank Management Application
11.description: This is a bank management app I made using Java Swing and AWT.

12.title: Demo Operating System
12.description: This is a demo operating system and file manager app I made using Java Swing and AWT.

1.title: Thesis Research
1.description: This is our thesis research, we trained an encoder decoder machine learning model to complete partially drawn shapes.
